AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.a cellular phone: Device used for personal communication, mentioned in the context of a call from United States Border Patrol Agent Hugo Benavides' supervisor
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the United States Border Patrol radio: Communication system used by United States Border Patrol agents to coordinate efforts and share information during operations, including details about traffic stops and encounters with vehicles
